analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nahetuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ
analyzed: na hetum na kusalam dhammam paccayā hetu kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetu

original: nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ nakusalaṁ
analyzed: na kusalam dhammam paccayā na hetu kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na kusala

original: dhammaṁ paccayā hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paccayā hetu kusalo ca na hetu kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na akusalam dhammam paccayā hetu akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na hetum na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca na hetu abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nanahetuṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na na hetum na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca na hetu abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ naabyākatañca nanahetuṁ naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu abyākato dhammo
analyzed: na hetum na abyākatam ca na na hetum na abyākatañca dhammam paṭicca na hetu abyākataḥ dhammaḥ

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
